mapper.insert: if not exists(select 1 from QuartzService where ReqUrl=#{reqUrl} or Name=#{name}) insert into QuartzService( appSource,reqUrl,Name,ExecTime,IsStart,Remark,createTime,createName,updateTime,updateName ) values(#{appSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{execTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, 0, #{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, getdate(), #{createName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, getdate(), #{updateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: if not exists(select 1 from QuartzService where id!=#{id} and (reqUrl=#{reqUrl} or Name=#{name})) update dbo.QuartzService set reqUrl=#{reqUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, name=#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ExecTime=#{execTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, updateTime=getdate(), updateName=#{updateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IsStart=0
